articles.title: Monumental Roman basin hidden for 2,000 years unearthed near Rome
articles.description: Archaeologists excavating the ancient Roman city of Gabii have uncovered a massive stone-lined basin that may represent one of Rome’s earliest monumental civic structures. articles.title: Franklin the Turtle book publisher condemns ‘violent’ post by U.S. defense secretary
articles.description: The publisher of the Franklin series of children’s books says an online post by U.S. Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth depicting the titular character as a bazooka-wielding soldier is denigrating and violent. articles.title: Dead stars aren’t so dead after all: The hidden force inflating white dwarfs
articles.description: Some white dwarfs in rapid binary orbits are far hotter and larger than theory predicts. Researchers found that powerful tidal forces between them generate enough heat to inflate their sizes and change their orbital behavior. articles.title: A hidden Antarctic shift unleashed the carbon that warmed the world
articles.description: As the last Ice Age waned and the Holocene dawned, deep-ocean circulation around Antarctica underwent dramatic shifts that helped release long-stored carbon back into the atmosphere.
